</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the size of the given marker. A getter for [[setMarkerSize]] and an alias of [[markerSize]].</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getMarkerSize''' markerName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [a-axis, b-axis], where:
* a-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 width of marker
* b-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 height of marker </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerSize]] [100,200];
_size = [[getMarkerSize]] "MarkerOne"; //returns [100,200]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
